original_text: Moses saw that the people were running about everywhere. Aaron had not been able to control them. If their enemies could see them, they would see how foolish they were.
korean_text: 모세가 본즉 백성이 방자하니 이는 아론이 그들을 방자하게 하여 원수에게 조롱거리가 되게 하였음이라

sentences.original_text: Moses saw that the people were running about everywhere
sentences.korean_translation: 모세는 백성들이 사방으로 뛰어다니고 있는 것을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: Aaron had not been able to control them
If their enemies could see them
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그들의 원수들이 그들을 볼 수 있었다면

sentences.original_text: they would see how foolish they were
